code: import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import React from"react";import{Card}from"react-bootstrap";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import Rating from"../components/Rating";var Product=function Product(_ref){var product=_ref.product;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:"my-3 p-3 rounded",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(product._id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Img,{class:"card-img-top",src:product.image,variant:"top"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(product._id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{as:"div",style:{minHeight:"4vh"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:product.name})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{as:"div",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Rating,{value:product.rating,text:"".concat(product.numReviews," reviews")})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Text,{as:"h3",className:"py-2",children:["$",product.price]})]})]});};export default Product;

sourcesContent: import React from "react" import { Card } from "react-bootstrap" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import Rating from "../components/Rating" const Product = ({ product }) => { return ( {product.name} ${product.price} ) } export default Product
